sentences.en: For this, should develop all sorts of container flatcar and through traffic car.
sentences.cn: 为此, 应发展各种集装箱平车和联运车辆.

sentences.en: He curls up in a flatcar and watches the sky.
sentences.cn: 他在一节平板车上蜷作一团、望着夜空.

sentences.en: Nowadays, the coal transportation of the railway generally used the flatcar in China.
sentences.cn: 我国现阶段, 煤在铁路运输中一般都采用敞车运输.

sentences.en: One more detail: one of the railroad branch lines ran not far from the hospital. There was a heavy gun on a specially equipped open flatcar connected to a locomotive.
sentences.cn: 有一个细节：离医院不远的一条铁路支线上有一列列车，上边有一节开放式的货车连着机车，货车上安放有一门重炮。

words.tran_cn: 无盖货车；平台型铁路货车

trans.tran_cn: （铁路上的）平板货车，平车，平板车
trans.tran_en: a railway carriage without a roof or sides, used for carrying goods
